mapper.select: select * from bas_customer_foregift_refund_detailed where id = #{id} and num = #{num}
select num from bas_customer_foregift_refund_detailed where id = #{id} ORDER BY num DESC limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bas_customer_foregift_refund_detailed ( id, num, refund_money, refund_photo, refund_type, refund_operator, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{num}, #{refundMoney}, #{refundPhoto}, #{refundType}, #{refundOperator}, #{createTime} )
mapper.delete: DELETE b FROM bas_customer_foregift_order a LEFT JOIN bas_customer_foregift_refund_detailed b ON a.id = b.id WHERE a.customer_id = #{customerId}
